description:
Spencer Henry Hoko, from the Newcomer Contest, is back and has joined Team America! But why is he working for St. Pierre? Back at the South Tokyo branch, Kanmuri and the others desperately try to keep the store afloat with a demonstration sale!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le monde nous regarde ! Début de la coupe de Monaco !
Sekai ga Chuumoku!! Monaco Cup Honsen Start!
The World`s Watching!! The Monaco Cup Main Event Starts Now!
ทั่วโลกจับตามอง!! โมนาโกคัพรอบจริงสตาร์ท!
世界が注目!! モナコカップ本選スタート!
